description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows Layer-2 Bridge Network Driver Denial of Service vulnerability associated with CVE-2024-38101:

1. Download and install the relevant update packages for your version of Windows.
2. Verify the successful installation of updates through Windows Update or manually checking the installed updates list.
3. Restart your system to apply the changes.

**Details**:
- Critical updates available include:
  - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
  - For Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)
  - Other updates include [KB5040431](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431) and [KB5040448](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040448).
- This patch addresses vulnerabilities that could allow denial of service through an out-of-bounds read error.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure you are running a supported version of Windows.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with updates.
